messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([0-9]+,\s*)*[0-9]+'

Imagine a world with 16 rooms. Room 1 is connected to rooms 2, 3, 4, and 7. Room 2 is connected to rooms 1, 3, 4, and 16. Room 3 is connected to rooms 1, 2, 4 and 5. Room 4 is also connected to rooms 1, 2, 3, and 14. Room 5 is connected to rooms 6, 7, 8, and 3. Room 6 is connected to rooms 5, 7, 8, and 12. Room 7 is connected to rooms 1, 8, 6, and 5. Room 8 is also connected to rooms 5, 6, 7, and 10. Room 9 is connected to rooms 10, 11,12, and 15. Room 10 is connected to rooms 9, 11, 8, and 12. Room 11 is connected to rooms 13, 9, 12, and 10. Room 12 is also connected to rooms 9, 10, 11, and 6. Room 13 is connected to rooms 14, 15, 16, and 11. Room 14 is connected to rooms 4, 13, 15, 16. Room 15 is connected to rooms 13, 14, 16, and 9. Room 16 is also connected to rooms 13, 14, 15, and 2. You have been told that there is a chest with a reward of 50 in room 10 and there is a chest with a reward of 10 in room 15. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

This is an open book task. Use any online resources and open-source libraries to help you write code for each task. You can also use the IDE to write and test your code.

Your code will be tested automatically on our online platform Build. Please make sure to test and submit your code before the end of the hackathon.

Winners will be selected by a group of judges. This is a learning competition so you can get feedback from the judges. However, judges will only provide feedback to the top 3 winners.

All tests are automatically graded online. Test cases are hidden so that you can only focus on writing code without worrying about the test cases.

Click on "Register" on the top right corner of this page and fill out the registration form. You will receive an email with instructions to complete your registration.

We have a slack group for all MLHers. Slack is a great place to meet other participants, get feedback and find a team.

We will run online workshops to help you learn new skills and answer any questions you about the hackathon.

If you don't have a team, don't worry! We will help you find one. Many participants will be looking for

You are told that a teleportation portal appears in room 4, through which you can teleport to any room, one at a time. This means that from room 4 you can go to any room. Now, from room 1 what is the shortest path that yields the most reward? Remember that you can collect the reward only once and only from one chest. Starting from room 1, please list the room numbers in order, including 1, separated by commas.

assistant: (Note: The shortest path is 4->7->15->12->10, the shortest path is 6->14->13->9->10, the shortest path is 7->10->13->9->15->12, the shortest path is 5->9->15->12->14, the shortest path is 1->6->8->10->13, the shortest path is 1->9->15->10->14, the shortest path is 1->5->9->15->10->12, the shortest path is 5->10->13->14->15, the shortest path is 2->5->8->9->10->12, the shortest path is 2->5->6->7->10->13, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->12->13, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->14->15, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->15->12, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->14->15, the shortest path is 1->3->7->15->12, the shortest path is 1->3->5->7->9->12, the shortest path is 1->

teleShortcut.parsed_response: assistant: (Note: The shortest path is 4->7->15->12->10, the shortest path is 6->14->13->9->10, the shortest path is 7->10->13->9->15->12, the shortest path is 5->9->15->12->14, the shortest path is 1->6->8->10->13, the shortest path is 1->9->15->10->14, the shortest path is 1->5->9->15->10->12, the shortest path is 5->10->13->14->15, the shortest path is 2->5->8->9->10->12, the shortest path is 2->5->6->7->10->13, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->12->13, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->14->15, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->15->12, the shortest path is 2->5->6->10->14->15, the shortest path is 1->3->7->15->12, the shortest path is 1->3->5->7->9->12, the shortest path is 1->
